original_text:
Once you spoke in a vision,
    to your faithful people you said:
“I have bestowed strength on a warrior;
    I have raised up a young man from among the people.
korean_text: 그 때에 주께서 환상 중에 주의 성도들에게 말씀하여 이르시기를 내가 능력 있는 용사에게는 돕는 힘을 더하며 백성 중에서 택함 받은 자를 높였으되

sentences.original_text: Once you spoke in a vision
to your faithful people you said
I have bestowed strength on a warrior
I have raised up a young man from among the people
